name: pancake.io
description:
A fun competitive game based on pancakes !

As a pancake pan, collect a maximum of pancakes to be in the top of the rankings. Throw pancakes on your enemies to make them lose their pancakes and thus enlarge your pancakes tower !

When you have enough pancakes, sit on the Pancakes King's Throne to win the game !

A lot of differents fun pans are available, unlock'em all !
